name: Storm Chaser (jamedesign)
description:
This is a very very basic Perlenspiel game.

Dodge the falling raindrops and lightning bolts to survive as long as you can!

Some lightning bolts will spawn shockwaves that must be jumped over.

HOW TO PLAY:

Use the left and right arrow keys to move left and right.

Use the up arrow key to jump.

Refresh the webpage to restart the game.
